name: TheCountryBlend
0:
”Alexa, Play The Country Blend”
”Alexa, Ask The Country Blend to Tell me about it”
”Alexa, Ask The Country Blend to Give more information”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the country blend
des:
To use Skill say: Alexa, play The Country Blend
to stop say: Alexa, Stop

Join us at The Country Blend, your ultimate destination for a unique country music experience! We're more than just a radio station; we’re your ticket to a world of foot-stomping, heart-touching country melodies that are guaranteed to leave you hootin’ and hollerin’! Our devoted team of country-loving DJs is dedicated to sharing their passion with you, delivering wild, energetic, and soul-stirring country tunes like no other. Our carefully crafted playlists strike the perfect balance between modern hits and cherished favorites, catering to your diverse tastes. Broadcasting across the United States, Canada, and the UK, The Country Blend brings people together through the power of music. And with full licensing for all music transmissions through Live365, you can sit back, relax, and enjoy the country magic with legal peace of mind. So, put on your cowboy hat, turn up the volume, and let The Country Blend take you on an unforgettable journey through the heart of country music. Yeehaw!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
